name: Bendy 2D: Low Budget Edition Chapter Three
name_original: Bendy 2D: Low Budget Edition Chapter Three
description:
⚠ This Game Contains Jumpscares, Flashing Lights & Loud Noises! ⚠

WELCOME TO BENDY 2D Chapter Three!

Play As Henry As He Ventures Into The Depths Of Heavenly Toys And Must Do An Angel's Bidding! Can You Help Him Escape The Grasps Of A Twisted Angel?

GAME DISCLAMIER:

Credits to Joey Drew Studios for the original game NOT AN OFFICIAL BENDY AND THE INK MACHINE PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH JOEY DREW STUDIOS INC. THIS PROJECT IS NON-PROFIT AND IS MADE FOR NO OTHER REASON THEN FOR FUN! the use of Batim Assets Is To signify its a bendy fangame and nothing else. Check Out The Original Game! It's Awesome!

GAME CONTROLS:

- Click To Use Weapons On Enemies, Audio Logs Of  Former Employees,  Use Levers, And  Press Buttons!

- W,S,A,D To Move Henry Around The Cartoon Studio!

- E To Interact With Miracle Stations To Hide Away From Dangerous  Situations!
